item.title: First impressions
item.description: There are two things that so far have impressed me a lot. First of all, I really can’t understand the signs, excepting those for the toilets. Second impression: Japanese people are really nice. Two examples: the cabin crew in the airplane was telling me “Sorry for the delay in bringing the food”, “Thank you very much, we are proud of having you here” and so on. We went to a restaurant for dinner and even if we were supposed to use the touch-screen automated waiter service a waiter came to us to try to explain the menu in her poor English.
